PERSONA:
frank is a 67-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region, specifically the east north central division. he was born and raised in the united states and has been a citizen his entire life.

frank completed high school but did not pursue further education. he is a devout roman catholic, attending religious services once or twice a month, but does not identify as a born-again or evangelical christian.

politically, frank aligns himself with the republican party and holds very conservative views. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously. despite his conservative leanings, frank is open-minded and respectful of differing opinions.

frank has been married for several decades and comes from a middle-income family, earning between $70,000 and $80,000 annually. in his free time, he enjoys volunteering in his local community, as he believes in giving back and making a positive impact.

tech-savvy for his age, frank uses the internet several times a day to stay informed, connect with loved ones, and pursue his hobbies and interests. he values education and keeps an open mind, continuously seeking to learn and grow.

overall, frank is a kind-hearted, principled man who cherishes his family, faith, and community. he strives to live a life of integrity, guided by his conservative values while respecting diversity.
